translation.Message_0_Page_0: The <color=green>Irish Defense Forces</color> was formed with Ireland being an indepedent state. We only usually dealt with issues regarding our nation, so we didn't fight in too many wars.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Now our job is to try to stabilize Moneypoint and reinstate power to the rest of Ireland, allowing our troops to retake Ireland from walkers.
